attributes.action: Send none British citizens back where they belong
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would our country be in this current financial state if we had never joined the EU? English people (by this i mean people born in England) need English jobs, the money earnt in this country needs to be spent in this country and not sent abroad and spent in a foreign economy.
Every week in our local paper (a small rural city) there is a new story involving non-British people attacking others, One 17yr old lad being brutally murdered by a gang of 4 polish is the most recent, how much more happens in other parts of the uk, in the bigger cities? Do we allow none British to live in our country in our United Kingdom?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
